DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value for the result of a graphical analysis technique based on two compartment model that uses linear regression to identify and analyze pharmacokinetics involving irreversible uptake in one compartment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A graphical analysis technique based on two compartment model that uses linear regression to identify and analyze pharmacokinetics problems involving irreversible uptake in one compartment._The property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the horizontal; the tangent of the angle it forms with the positive X axis._Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
